Text: Red Rock Admin Contract Cc Dennis Please Adjust the Red Rock Administrative contract as shown on the Dec sheet This now reserves both Rec Del points for dth Call PT with any questions

RE EPFS interconnect Cc Let me know if you need a level A or level B in my book a level B is a good to go estimate The prior scope of MMBtud was the max the tap could handle any thing over this will require additional modifications Ill let you know the results as soon as I know something Call PT with any questions From Lorraine nronXgate on PM To Perry FrazierET NRON Arnie BaileyET NRON cc Eric FaucheauxET nron Ben AsanteET NRON Team CarlsbadET NRON Rich JollyET NRON Mike McCrackenET NRON James MooreET NRON Earl ChanleyET NRON Kevin nronxgate Subject RE EPFS interconnect I just got off the phone with El Paso Field Services At this time I now need cost estimates One to increase the facilities to be able to handle up to MMBtud and the second to increase the facilities to be able to handle up to MMBtud EPFS has indicated this incremental flow could come to TW as soon as midMay Please advise Thank you Lorraine Original Message From Lindberg Lorraine Sent Wednesday March AM To Frazier Perry Bailey Arnie Cc Faucheaux Eric Asante Ben Carlsbad Team Jolly Rich McCracken Mike Moore James Chanley Earl Hyatt Kevin Subject RE EPFS interconnect I have not requested a Level A cost estimate I need the exact amount we think this will cost so that EPFS will fund the entire amount Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Tuesday March PM To Bailey Arnie Cc Faucheaux Eric Lindberg Lorraine Asante Ben Carlsbad Team Jolly Rich McCracken Mike Moore James Chanley Earl Subject Re EPFS interconnect Status Report for Jim Rischer called and we discussed his Teams ideas on the mods to increase the flow to mmcfd James Moore myself sat down and reviewed his project file for the current design We reviewed the notes of his field visit to the site and the information from the EPFS field hand Action Plans Informed Lorraine that I would give her a status update next Tuesday on the progress to complete a level A cost estimate Tenative completion of given at this time James Moore will check out the ultasonic meter requirements availability and costs He will call George Kneisley to verify that the GFC TAS Sys II will work with the USM He will also contact Becker to make sure the flow controll valve will handle the mmcf noise levels and fps limits These results will dictate the major costs for the modifications Carlsbad Team I need to know if there are any equipment needs like signal splitter on the USM for EPFS and what about the current orifice transmitters Is the chromatagraph on site Purchase power is on site right Let me know if you have any additional information or scope changes to these action plans PT OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap From Arnie Bailey PM To Perry FrazierET NRON cc Eric FaucheauxET nron Lorraine LindbergET NRON Ben AsanteET NRON Team CarlsbadET nron Rich JollyET NRON Subject Re EPFS interconnect Perry Let the team and I know what we can do to help Let me know how things progress Thanks Arnie Forwarded by Arnie BaileyETSEnron on PM OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap Rich Jolly PM To Eric FaucheauxET nron cc Perry FrazierET NRON Lorraine LindbergET NRON Ben AsanteET NRON Team nron Arnie BaileyET nron Subject Re EPFS interconnect OLE Object StdOleLink Arnie and Team will you work with Perry on this Let me know how I can help Eric thanks for sending to me Thanks Rich OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap Eric Faucheaux AM OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap To Perry FrazierET NRON cc Lorraine LindbergETSEnron Ben AsanteET NRON Rich JollyET NRON Subject EPFS interconnect Perry please take this one and reply to Lorraine expected delivery date Thanks EF x Forwarded by Eric FaucheauxETSEnron on AM From Lorraine nronXgate on PM To Eric FaucheauxET nron cc Kevin nronxgate Subject EPFS interconnect Eric Please provide me with a cost estimate to increase the meter facilities from MMBtud to MMBtud at the new receipt point with El Paso Field Services in Eddy County NM I would like a good to go with cost estimate so that I may request full reimbursement from EPFS EPFS has indicated they will be in a position to send this incremental gas to TW in a couple of months Please let me know the estimated time you need to develop this cost estimate Thanks Lorraine

Re Revision to Contract Agave Energy Company Extension Amendment Cc Facility Planning approves the amendment to the term for Agave CBS contract for Dth and contract for Dth SHIPPER Agave Energy Company TERM Thru CONTRACT REC PTVOLUME Agave Atoka Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Long Arroyo Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Salt Creek Dthd REC PTVOLUME Yates LEC Plant Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Red Bluff Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Rio Pecos Dthd DEL PTVOLUME Socal Needles Dthd Martha Cormier PM To Perry FrazierET NRON Ted NRON Paul NRON Dale EldridgeET NRON Dennis LeeET NRON Kevin HyattET nron Martha CormierET NRON cc Subject Revision to Contract Agave Energy Company Extension Amendment Credit and Capacity Requested Date Correction SHIPPER Agave Energy Company TERM Thru CONTRACT REC PTVOLUME Agave Atoka Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Long Arroyo Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Salt Creek Dthd REC PTVOLUME Yates LEC Plant Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Red Bluff Dthd REC PTVOLUME Agave Rio Pecos Dthd DEL PTVOLUME Socal Needles Dthd Thanks Michelle

POGO interconnect Lea County New Mexico Forwarded by Perry FrazierETSEnron on PM Perry Frazier PM To Christine StokesET nron cc Earl ChanleyET nron Subject POGO interconnect Lea County New Mexico Christine POGO has requested a new interconnect with TW in Sec TS RE of Lea County New Mexico There is a on existing tap at station between Mile Post south of WTI indentified by the local operations team The cost estimate below contains the usual and customary facility and equipment costs Chromatograph HO Monitor HS Monitor EFM Flow control Positive shutin Flow bypass Engi CSUP Contig Subtotal Tax Grossup Total These cost are identical to the EOG numbers from the EC Team Once again the turn around time is generally days from work order generation to inservice reporting The equipment best case delivery is days with about a day turn around time in construction Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance

Re PGE EnergyTrading Contract Amendment Cc Planning confirms a verbal approval to PGE contract as follows SHIPPER PGE TradingGas Corporation TERM Thru CONTRACT REC PTVOLUME Tumbleweed POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME West Texas Pool POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME Amoco Abo POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME Central Pool POI Dthd DEL PTVOLUME Socal Needles POI Dthd Martha Cormier AM To Perry FrazierET NRON Dale EldridgeET NRON Dennis LeeET NRON Martha CormierET NRON Michelle LokayET nron cc Subject PGE EnergyTrading Contract Amendment SHIPPER PGE TradingGas Corporation TERM Thru CONTRACT REC PTVOLUME Tumbleweed POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME West Texas Pool POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME Amoco Abo POI Dthd REC PTVOLUME Central Pool POI Dthd DEL PTVOLUME Socal Needles POI Dthd Thanks Michelle
POGO Work Order Cc the POGO work order at Nhomedeptfacilitytwtwpogo icxls Let me know when I can take it to Marketing for signatures Thanks PT

Re POGO IC Lea Co Cc mind that if we wait to see if the well is a producer we have probably lost weeks of the week inservice that POGO has requested in their first conversations Since we have a prepayment I agree that the design and generation of a material list proceed Let me know if you hear anything contrary to what the field rep has conveyed to Laura K Please fax the signed copy of the work order to Reggie if you did not take care of it last Friday Have a great week PT Forwarded by Perry FrazierETSEnron on AM From Earl Chanley PM To Laura J Kunkel cc Perry FrazierET NRON Subject Re POGO IC Lea Co LK GO AHEAD WITH THE DESIGN AND MATERIAL LIST FOR THE INTERCONNECT AND KEEP TRACK OF TIME THEY HAVE PAID SOME MONEY UP FRONT AND WE CAN USE PART OF THAT IF NEEDED AND THEY DO NOT WANT THE IC LATER LETS JUST BE PREPARED IF NEEDED FOR A QUICK RESPONSE TIME THE WORK ORDER IS BEING SUBMITTED AND WE WILL HAVE A NUMBER ASAP AS USUAL YOU ARE EXCEEDING YOUR PERFORMANCE EXPECTATIONS AND BEING RESPONSIVE TO THE CUSTOMER I DONT HAVE TO SAY THAT ANYMORE I FORGOT AND THOUGHT YOU WERE STILL MY BOSS NOW I CAN REALLY SAY WHAT I WANT THANKS EC Laura J Kunkel on PM To Earl Chanley cc Subject POGO IC Lea Co EC I received a call from Richard Wright this afternoon and before he proceeds with hiring an engineering company et al he wants to make sure that the well will produce So that is on hold for a couple of weeks it sounds like However he did say that they would want it installed yesterday basically if it does produce At any rate I have requested ROW clearance from Cecil and sent the environmental matrix to Butch s they can proceed with their part Laura J Kunkel Project Manager TrigonSheehan LLC
Spreadsheet me at if you need anything
Nov nan

EOG PronghornThe intial agreement Bob presented to EOG was for this was to cover the cost to refurbishing the existing tap The work order was generated with this amount so that the ROW folks would intiate a Landowner notification letter ASAP EOG estimated a mmcfd volume and they were to supply all materials to reactivate this point A scope change was intiated and we were to supply the EFM for their meter tube a verbal cost estimate to Bob in the amount of was relayed A third scope change raised the volume estimate to over mmcfd which normally means we install additional instrumentation Operations at this time insisted we add the needed equipment to the work order The EC folks then put out the tighter cost estimate of This included the following cost revisions Chromatograph HO Monitor HS Monitor EFM Flow control Positive shutin Flow bypass Engi CSUP Contig Tax Grossup Total Call me if you have any questions PT

FW TW Unsubscribed CapacityCall me for a discussion PT Original Message From Huo Jeff Sent Wednesday February PM To Frazier Perry Cc Stacy Don Subject TW Unsubscribed Capacity Please go to our testing site to view the modified TW Unsubscribed Capacity web page and see if this is what you guys want I removed the borders because the table header and records page are in the different frames it is very hard to adjust them exactly straight into the same columns Thanks Jeff

RE TW Unsubscribed Capacity Cc Thanks for the quick turnaround on this enhancement Perry Original Message From Huo Jeff Sent Friday February PM To Lokay Michelle Frazier Perry Cc Hermanek Patty Kuehl Toby Lindberg Lorraine Subject RE TW Unsubscribed Capacity We will migrate these new changes to production wwwhottapenroncom on next Monday night and I will send a confirmation email out when it is done Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Jeff Original Message From Lokay Michelle Sent Friday February PM To Huo Jeff Frazier Perry Cc Hermanek Patty Kuehl Toby Lindberg Lorraine Subject RE TW Unsubscribed Capacity This looks good from the Commercial side I am assuming that when a customer uses the View Printable Page that printout header cannot be frozen Otherwise this is what we are looking for as far as viewing this spreadsheet on line When the formatting issues are resolved I recommend we move this to production Thanks Original Message From Huo Jeff Sent Friday February AM To Kuehl Toby Frazier Perry Lokay Michelle Cc Hermanek Patty Subject RE TW Unsubscribed Capacity I added an extra Printable Page button on the page so that the entire page can be printed out Michelle please let me know if you still have problems to get to the TW Unsubscribed Capacity page Sorry about the delay Thanks Jeff x Original Message From Kuehl Toby Sent Thursday February AM To Frazier Perry Huo Jeff Subject RE TW Unsubscribed Capacity Importance High I have an issue with this format When you print it the header nor disclaimer no longer shows up We have run into this issue before and that is why we have not put it in frames We may need to look at another format to cover the online users and the customers that print this report This has been an on going issue online when you scroll down you lose the header The printing customers wont think to highly of this format My suggestion is lets try look at another format that will cover both sides printing and viewing Jeff Perry we may have to get together and discuss this issue Toby Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Thursday February AM To Kuehl Toby Subject FW TW Unsubscribed Capacity Call me to discuss Perry Original Message From Huo Jeff Sent Wednesday February PM To Frazier Perry Cc Stacy Don Subject TW Unsubscribed Capacity Please go to our testing site to view the modified TW Unsubscribed Capacity web page and see if this is what you guys want I removed the borders because the table header and records page are in the different frames it is very hard to adjust them exactly straight into the same columns Thanks Jeff

PT out this afternoon Cc Hey guys I have been feeling progressively worse the last few days I am cutting out this afternoon with sick time See you on Monday No FT expected for this afternoon Ron My cell number is
Perry out on vacation Cc I will be out on vacation all next week I will be local except for Tues Thurs Any FT problems or concerns call my cell phone at
Nov nan

EOG PronghornThe intial agreement Bob presented to EOG was for this was to cover the cost to refurbishing the existing tap The work order was generated with this amount so that the ROW folks would intiate a Landowner notification letter ASAP EOG estimated a mmcfd volume and they were to supply all materials to reactivate this point A scope change was intiated and we were to supply the EFM for their meter tube a verbal cost estimate to Bob in the amount of was relayed A third scope change raised the volume estimate to over mmcfd which normally means we install additional instrumentation Operations at this time insisted we add the needed equipment to the work order The EC folks then put out the tighter cost estimate of This included the following cost revisions Chromatograph HO Monitor HS Monitor EFM Flow control Positive shutin Flow bypass Engi CSUP Contig Tax Grossup Total Call me if you have any questions PT

Breakdown of Panhandle to Station of mmcfdThis is what I have for the firm west on the Panhandle Call with any questions Plus

P Coolers and recycle line Cc I understand this Level A is approved for work order generation This is the cost from FP for a recyle line and coolers at P to handle NNG Gray flows to Station The NNG Gray is a mmcfd bidirectional interconnect with TW The min to run P is mmcfd the recycle would allow for those less than mmcfd flow requirements from NNG James can you give me a reality check on my numbers the estimate is stored on N under P Coolers and recycle line Charge your time to the Marketing lump sum work order Thanks

BP WTX to Oasis Cc Lorraine I ran a test case for the BP Dth from WTX Pool to Oasis for the term to Below are the findings Point capacities for Oasis Valero and Delhi Ward are okay for the term The lateral supplying these points is slighly over the path capacity of mcfd vs the FT of Dth for the remainder of Lateral capacity opens a little the first of Btu content of the gas is Need mcf of btu gas to get Dth through the lateral to the delivery points Risk If there is a call for all the gas at these delivery points USGT Dth Astra BP Misc then we are at the maximium flow Any facilities problems or summer temperature extremes and we might not operationally make the delivery volumes My recommendation would be to only allow Dth from BP Historically USGT has not utilized their full Dth Do we want to take the risk and allow BP the full Dth Darrell I need some help with this one Give me a call

RE WT Spreadsheet Cc paulyThanks for the time yesterday to sync the West Texas group unsubscribed volumes I reviewed your spreadsheets and had changes they are in red text with a green shade I have made the corresponding revisions to the CAS groups as a group adjustment The EBB will reflect these changes at or around the pm Friday update to the EBB I have attached the rev spreadsheet for your reference The Red Rock Adm Contracted volumes are right for the time period on your xls Thanks PT Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Thursday November PM To Frazier Perry Subject WT Spreadsheet Let me know if were syncingup If were off in June Dec check what I have for the Red Rock Adm Ctrc I know Dennis made some changes I think I have the most current but possibly not Thanks Lindy File WestTexasCapxls
Red RockOpen the attachment and call me at
Red Rock Admin Contract Cc Dennis Please Adjust the Red Rock Administrative contract as shown on the Dec sheet This now reserves both Rec Del points for dth Call PT with any questions

Contract AmendmentsDennis Please remove the ROFR flag from PGE contracts per Paul Ybarbo In addition amend the Red Rock expansion contract as indicated in red below PPL and Calpine now have their Red Rock expansion receipt volumes locked up in the West Texas area No more changes until the expansion is in service Thanks PT Adm cr POIs WTX PH Agave EPFSEddy

RE Amendment to TWDennis Here are the new numbers for the admin contract basically subtract from poi add it to for the contract term to Have fun PT Adm cr POIs WTX PH Agave EPFSEddy Original Message From Lokay Michelle Sent Friday March AM To Lee Dennis Frazier Perry Buehler Craig Subject Amendment to TW Approved Please generate amendment for Westerns Redrock expansion contract effective This amendment will now change their MMBtuday contract to have all receipts in the West Texas Pool Effective ending date will be the term of the contract through Thanks Original Message From Terri Dickerson mailto Sent Friday March AM To Lokay Michelle Subject Redrock Michelle This email is to inform you that I would like to adjust my Redrock Receipt point for the total volume of MMBtud to the Permian West Texas Pooling point consistent with our oral discussion Thank you Terri Dickerson
WTX Capacities for March April Michelle The information in the spreadsheet include the information for both your requests and Lorraines Call me with any questions

FW TW Well ConnectsMark I had a message from Jennifer Greenwell wanting to know the status of the Cost estimate I probably didt make myself clear in the memo below but I thought you were going to call her back Let me know if you need me to contact her Our usual procedure is to contact the client only when clarification is needed otherwise all transactions are between you and them PT Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Thursday October AM To Alters Dennis McConnell Mark Cc Abdmoulaie Mansoor Chanley Earl Subject RE TW Well Connects Mark I called Tommy Edwards with Cima yesterday morning and talked with him about his plans for the new interconnect he has proposed They have completed well and will drill up to more development wells in the near future The location he verified is Sec TS RE Eddy County New Mexico He called us wanting an IC because the old map he was using indicated that Enron owned the lines The problem is that these were the gathering lines that we sold to Agave years ago We still own the Atoka gathering compression units and the main branch lines but these wells will have to be connected to the Agaves Gathering system I spent some time looking at this yesterday afternoon and have not relayed this information to him Please call me to discuss any concerns before you call Tommy Perry Frazier Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Thursday October PM To Alters Dennis McConnell Mark Cc Abdmoulaie Mansoor Chanley Earl Subject RE TW Well Connects Mark I have talked with Jennifer Greenwell about the Nadel Gussman Buffalo Hunt well to be drilled starting on or around October The target is the Atoka Morrow formation with expected volumes of about to mmbtud with a working pressure of psig The well location is about a mile off of our WTX Lateral at Mile Post south of Station NG will have to set a small compressor to get into TW because the line pressures are in the range of psig The alignment sheets do not indicate an existing tap on either of our lines a new hot tap will be required for connection The volumes are so small that it appears it might be more cost effective to lay the mile of line pipe to Agave The following are the results of a discussion I had with the Earl EC on the costs required to connect to our system Hot Tap and EFM HS HO Unknowns Totals Basically the range is around the K to K level I will need to verify with the Carlsbad Team about the project if it looks like a go Jennifer was going to use the numbers to figure her costbenefit analysis for choosing TW or Agave My recommendation would be to go to Agave if she can justify the costs for miles of line Perry Frazier Original Message From Alters Dennis Sent Thursday October AM To Frazier Perry McConnell Mark Cc Abdmoulaie Mansoor Subject TW Well Connects Mark Perry will be your direct contact on these projects Perry Please provide location and avaliable tap information to Mark I have left a message for Mark to see if he will need Planning to provide Level A Cost estimates It is OK to contact the producers directly Well Cima Contact Tommy Edwards MMBtud Approx psig TS RE Section Eddy or Chaves County Tx Miles SSW of Hope Well Nadel and Gussman Contact Jennifer Greenwell MMBtud Approx to psig TS RE Section

RE TW Well Connects Cc Mark I have talked with Jennifer Greenwell about the Nadel Gussman Buffalo Hunt well to be drilled starting on or around October The target is the Atoka Morrow formation with expected volumes of about to mmbtud with a working pressure of psig The well location is about a mile off of our WTX Lateral at Mile Post south of Station NG will have to set a small compressor to get into TW because the line pressures are in the range of psig The alignment sheets do not indicate an existing tap on either of our lines a new hot tap will be required for connection The volumes are so small that it appears it might be more cost effective to lay the mile of line pipe to Agave The following are the results of a discussion I had with the Earl EC on the costs required to connect to our system Hot Tap and EFM HS HO Unknowns Totals Basically the range is around the K to K level I will need to verify with the Carlsbad Team about the project if it looks like a go Jennifer was going to use the numbers to figure her costbenefit analysis for choosing TW or Agave My recommendation would be to go to Agave if she can justify the costs for miles of line Perry Frazier Original Message From Alters Dennis Sent Thursday October AM To Frazier Perry McConnell Mark Cc Abdmoulaie Mansoor Subject TW Well Connects Mark Perry will be your direct contact on these projects Perry Please provide location and avaliable tap information to Mark I have left a message for Mark to see if he will need Planning to provide Level A Cost estimates It is OK to contact the producers directly Well Cima Contact Tommy Edwards MMBtud Approx psig TS RE Section Eddy or Chaves County Tx Miles SSW of Hope Well Nadel and Gussman Contact Jennifer Greenwell MMBtud Approx to psig TS RE Section

RE DukePampaJust let me know the number or meeting place for this meeting I got the room change for the other Duke meeting thanks Lorraine PT Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Friday January AM To Lindberg Lorraine Frazier Perry Subject RE DukePampa Yes I can Let me know when this is finalized ds Original Message From Lindberg Lorraine Sent Friday January AM To Schoolcraft Darrell Frazier Perry Subject DukePampa Can we have a conference call Tuesday at am to discuss a new well Duke would like to bring on near P I have s about operational issues dehy issues and custody transfer Please let me know if this time works for you Thanks Lorraine
